pros: Working with amazing staff (non management) and volunteers. The cause is actually a great one.
cons: High Turnover amongst non management, no growth opportunities, 50% of their staff is some form of management. Toxic environment created by Execs. HR does not act on complaints against donors and volunteers who harass staff. While HR is fully staffed, they fail to document issues against execs.

pros: Good programs for kids and families.
cons: Very weak leadership. Staff not supported or valued. Very high turnover. Primary focus of leadership is presenting a good appearance to donors. Lack of diversity in staff and volunteer base.

job_title: Human Resources Generalist in Toronto, ON
pros: It's a great organization, that is going through a new phase.
Great coworkers; great mission; very well supported; lots of vacation (for an entry level job); great benefits
cons: Few opportunities for growth within the organization
